GLUNEWNURBSRENDERER(3G) GLUNEWNURBSRENDERER(3G)

NAME

gluNewNurbsRenderer - create a NURBS object

C SPECIFICATION

GLUnurbs* gluNewNurbsRenderer( void )









DESCRIPTION


gluNewNurbsRenderer creates and returns a pointer to a new
    NURBS object. This object must be referred to when calling NURBS rendering
    and control functions. A return value of 0 means that there is not enough
    memory to allocate the object.






SEE
  ALSO


gluBeginCurve, gluBeginSurface, gluBeginTrim,
    gluDeleteNurbsRenderer, gluNurbsCallback,
    gluNurbsProperty
